title: Causal Inference for Hypertension Prediction With Wearable Electrocardiogram and Photoplethysmogram Signals: Feasibility Study
details: K Gong, Y Chen, X Song, Z Fu, X Ding - JMIR Cardio, 2025
abstract: Background Hypertension is a leading cause of cardiovascular disease and premature death worldwide, and it puts a heavy burden on the health care system. Therefore, it is very important to detect and evaluate hypertension and related …
